name: glasgow

a large city in central Scotland: Her work is on display at the Kelvingrove museum in Glasgow.
More examplesFewer examplesHe drove the 400 miles from Glasgow to London.Three of the 12 bands nominated for the prestigious Mercury Music Prize this year are from Glasgow.She recently retired from the University of Glasgow.He was a regular at fashionable Glasgow nightclubs like "La Ronde" in Sauchiehall Street.
